text: Telegram () is a 1971 Soviet adventure movie directed by Rolan Bykov.Как менялась новогодняя елка в советских фильмахТЕЛЕГРАММА (1971) It stars Nina Arkhipova, Elya Baskin, and Yuri Nikulin. == Actors == * Nina Arkhipova as Katya Inozemtseva * Elya Baskin as school teacher * Yuri Nikulin as Fedor Fedorovich * Valentina Berezutskaya as pies seller * Nikolay Burlyaev as Gleb, Zina's son == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1971 adventure movies Category:Soviet adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Rolan Bykov
title: Telegram (movie)
